item.title: MLK DAY 2026 It's Never about Race
item.description: It's NEVER about race!¬†Until we can say with evidence that it is never about race, it is dishonest and shortsighted to state that "it is not always about race!" Such framing is harmful and yields zero solutions towards fairness and equity.‚Ä¶

item.title: Honoring King's Legacy and What Last Week's Board of Health Meeting Tells Us
item.description: Hi Everyone,I trust this MLK Day finds you well despite the frigid weather. Whether you are participating in a public celebration or prefer quiet reflection, I hope you are taking time to consider Dr. King's life -- his work, his words, his legacy.
